attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London 2012 Olympic games are supposed to be regarded as a national treasure, showing to the world what this nation can do. Yet despite this the olympic committee have chosen to take a quite frankly embarrising symbol to represent the games. As has been quoted before it looks like a bad 1990's game. The lack of foreward thinking is unbelievable. With so many other choices apparent, and even made and presented on national news bullitins i would be ashamed if this logo is used.
Change it now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
